quests.name: Uncanny Romance
objectives: Plant the 10 Deadly Nightshade and harvest after 15 minutes.
Make sure you have the 10 Deadly Nightshade in your Inventory.
Bring the Deadly Nightshade to Sally.
Talk to Jack Skellington about his upcoming date with Sally.
Gather 2 Night Shards.
Bring the Night Shard to Jack Skellington.
Listen to Sally and Jack.
Talk to Sally about the awkward date.

Ask the following Villagers for dating advice:
  ‧ Daisy.
  ‧ Minnie Mouse.

Prepare Jack and Sally's picnic by:
  ‧ Baking some:
    ‧ Halloween Gingerbread Cookies.
    ‧ Caramel Apples.
  ‧ Create a new and frighteningly lovely date night in the Forgotten Lands with:
    ‧ 1 Holiday Tree-Portal.
    ‧ 2 Outdoor Furniture.
    ‧ 3 Halloween Furniture.
    ‧ 4 Black Furniture.

Make sure you have the following meals in your Inventory:
  ‧ Halloween Gingerbread Cookies.
  ‧ Caramel Apples.
Bring the Halloween date meals to Sally.
Listen to Sally and Jack's second date attempt.
Talk to Sally about her (less awkward) talk with Jack.
Place the Halloween Picnic Kit near the Holiday Tree Portal.
Take a picture of Sally and Jack.
Talk to Sally.

quests.name: Decay to Grow
objectives: Talk to Remy.

Gather materials for a Compost Bin.
  ‧ 15 Bricks.
  ‧ 10 Soil.
  ‧ 10 Dark Wood.
  ‧ 3 Vegetable Trimmings from Remy.
Craft a Compost Bin.
Make sure you have the Compost Bin in your Inventory.
Bring the Compost Bin to Sally in the Vitalys Mines.
Talk to Sally.
Follow Sally through the Vitalys Mines.
Talk to Sally.

Gather the following materials from the Sunlit Plateau:
  ‧ 6 Dry Wood.
  ‧ 8 Dried Plants.
Go back to the Vitalys Mines and place the Dry Wood and Dried Plants in the Compost Bin.

Make sure you have the following materials in your Inventory:
  ‧ 6 Dry Wood.
  ‧ 8 Dried Plants.
Bring the materials to Sally in the Vitalys Mines.

Gather materials to make the Critter Trap.
  ‧ 10 Hardwood.
  ‧ 5 Blueberry.
  ‧ 2 Iron Ingots.
  ‧ 5 Dream Shards.
Craft a Critter Trap.
Head back to the Vitalys Mines to place the trap.
Make sure you have the Critter Trap in your Inventory.
Bring the Critter Trap to Sally in the Vitalys Mines.
Dig out 3 worms in the Glade of Trust.
Bring the worms to Sally.
Go into the Vitalys Mines to check the Compost Bin.
Mike is caught in the Critter Trap? Talk to him.
Listen to Sally explain her compost setup to Mike.
Talk to Sally.

quests.name: Patchwork Party
objectives: Ask Daisy about collaborating on a sewing project with Sally.

Gather the materials for Daisy and Minnie's newest project:
  ‧ 3 Gold Ingot.
  ‧ 5 Purple Impatiens.
  ‧ 5 Fabric.
  ‧ 6 Red Bell Flower.
Bring the materials to Sally so she can help with Daisy and Minnie's newest project.
Go inside Minnie's House.
Listen to Sally and Daisy inside Minnie's House.
Talk to Sally about a sewing project.
(Optional) Talk to Minnie Mouse.
(Optional) Talk to Daisy.
Talk to The Fairy Godmother.

Collect and create memorabilia from your Valley adventures:
  ‧ Fish an Ancient Crystal from the Mystical Cave.

Collect and create memorabilia from your Valley adventures:
  ‧ Find a Feather in the Forest of Valor.
  ‧ Find a Snowman's Nose in a cavernous region in the Frosted Heights.
  ‧ Find a Storybook in the Forgotten Lands.

Cook to create memorabilia from your Valley adventures:
  ‧ Fruit Salad.
  ‧ Root Beer.
Go inside the Fairy Godmother's House.

Make sure you have the following items in your Inventory:
  ‧ Ancient Crystal.
  ‧ Donald's Feather.
  ‧ Forgotten Storybook.
  ‧ Fruit Salad.
  ‧ Snowman's Nose.
  ‧ Root Beer.
Bring everything to Sally.

Ask Villagers about their favorite food memories:
  ‧ Mickey Mouse.
  ‧ The Forgotten.
  ‧ Kristoff.
  ‧ Donald Duck.

Cook the following meals:
  ‧ Fish Sandwich.
  ‧ Bouillabaisse.
  ‧ Carrot Cake.
  ‧ Fish Salad.
Bring your Dreamlight memorabilia to Sally.
Place the Dreamlight Memory Quilt anywhere in the Valley.
Celebrate the Dreamlight Memory Quilt with the Village.
The quilt party was a success! Talk to Sally to see how it went.

quests.name: Preposterous Premonitions
objectives: Talk to Ursula.

Fetch a potion Ingredient for Sally.
  ‧ 5 Arcane Sprout in the Forgotten Lands.
Head inside Sally and Jack's House.

Make sure you have the following Ingredients in your Inventory:
  ‧ 5 Arcane Sprout.
Bring the Ingredients to Sally.
Sally had a premonition?! Interact with it inside her House.
Talk to Sally about her premonition.
Find the cave from Sally's premonition to find more clues.
Search for a clue in the Cursed Cave.
You've found a clue! Give it to Sally.
Sally had another premonition! Interact with it inside the Cursed Cave.
Talk to Sally about her second premonition.

Talk to the following Villagers about Sally's premonitions:
  ‧ Mickey Mouse.
  ‧ Scrooge McDuck.
Talk to Sally about your attempts to warn Scrooge McDuck and Mickey.
Head into the Cursed Cave before it's too late!
Confront Ursula about her plot!
Talk to Sally about foiling Ursula's plot.
Listen to Sally confronting Ursula.
Put Sally's potion in Ursula's cauldron to stop the ritual.

Talk to the people involved:
  ‧ Mickey Mouse.
  ‧ Scrooge McDuck.
  ‧ Ursula.
Head inside Mickey's House.
Listen to Sally and Mickey.
Talk to Sally.
